All,

I have now got the video of the "Separating REST Facts from Fallacies=
" 
[1] presentation I gave at DDD7 [2] in November. Microsoft hosted the 
c=
onference and provided the video technicians (which is why there are 
MS di=
sclaimers plastered on the video).

There is an embedded flash stream video=
 [3] version, weighing in at 
178MB (so please be a little patient whilst i=
t loads) and a WMV 
version (290MB) for easy download [4].

I am interested=
 in feedback as I have four confirmed user group 
bookings for this talk in=
 the UK in the next 2/3 months and have 
proposed it for two further confer=
ences (alongside "Delivering RESTful 
systems with Microsoft Azure" as a do=
uble session).

ts-from-
fallacies-presentation
